Articles.Content:
Somehow, no matter what RCS thrusters i use, i cant control yaw anymore. Pitch (W and S) work but yaw(A and D) will do nothing, the thrusters wont even fire.

 

Does anyone have any ideas on what I could try to fix it? I havent installed any mods/add ons between the time when it worked and when it suddenly stopped

 

EDIT: Even the fins I have on the rocket only move to adjust pitch, almost like its just not getting the signal from the keyboard to control yaw, but even mechjeb wont adjust the yaw....Im completely out of ideas

EDIT 2: The stuff I already had in orbit around the Mun and Minmus still has pitch AND yaw control, but when I launch a rocket, even the rocket (subassembly) I used to launch the stuff to the Mun and Minmus, it suddently doesnt have yaw control...... 

Edited December 2, 2015 by crash087
OK and now it suddenly works again... Apparently just playing around with the ships in orbit where it worked for a little while magically fixed them on Kerbin? IDK but it works now so im happy
